Articles.Content:
The game keeps giving error code:

Kerbal Space Program 2 - Unity 2020.3.33f1_915a7af8b0d5 
I’ve updated the graphics drivers and meet the minimum required specs:

CPU: Core i5 2410M

GPU: AMD Radeon 7400M 

If you do, please share, I don’t want to have to refund the game on day 1
That doesn't look like an error code, it looks like the first line of a log file indicating the version of the product.

Same (IMHO) problem - it looks the "PD Launcher" dont work flawless on all systems....

Starting the KSP exe direkt solve this problem for me actually ....

2 minutes ago, R-TEAM said:

Same (IMHO) problem - it looks the "PD Launcher" dont work flawless on all systems....

Starting the KSP exe direkt solve this problem for me actually ....

Didn’t work for me   Even tried running as administrator
looks you are way under the minnimum specs ...... (only 2 core mobile CPU .... mobile GPU from 2011)
